Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a client that has connected to the server via it's own socket.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Establishes a connection with the server and instantiates the input/output streams. Starts login GUI and retrieves client username. Displays the GUI and sends/listens for messages.

      • usernameGUI

        public static java.lang.String usernameGUI()
        Starts the login GUI for the client
        Returns:
        the client's username

      • displayMenu

        public static void displayMenu()
        Displays the menu (main) GUI

      • getMessage

        public static void getMessage()
        This method is constantly called inside the while (true) loop in Client's main method. It listens for incoming messages and calls MessageHandler to determine what to do with the message.

      • getOnlineUsers

        public static void getOnlineUsers(Message message)
        Retrieves a list of online users from the server
        Parameters:
        message - - message object containing the online users

      • updateChat

        public static void updateChat(Message msgObj)
        Updates the group chat with the message specified in msgObj's body.
        Parameters:
        msgObj - - the message object containing the message string to be appended to the chat text area.

      • requestReceiveFileAtDestinationUser

        public static void requestReceiveFileAtDestinationUser(Message message)
        Prompts the destination user of a file transfer request to accept or deny the file.
        Parameters:
        message - - message object containing source user and filename

      • notifySourceUserTransferDenied

        public static void notifySourceUserTransferDenied()
        Display a JOptionPane to notify the source user of a file transfer request that the transfer has been denied by destination user.

      • notifySourceUserAndInitiateFileSending

        public static void notifySourceUserAndInitiateFileSending(Message message)
        Display a JOptionPane to notify the source user of a file transfer request that the transfer request has been accepted. Begin file transfer.
        Parameters:
        message - - message object containing destUser

      • promptDestUserForFilenameAndReceiveTransfer

        public static void promptDestUserForFilenameAndReceiveTransfer(Message message)
        If the file transfer is being initiated{ Display a JOptionPane to request a filename for file to be saved at the destination user.} Receive file packet.
        Parameters:
        message - - message object containing file packets to be downloaded

      • sendFile

        public static void sendFile(java.lang.String filename,
                            java.lang.String destUser)
        Send a file to the destination user via server, packet by packet.
        Parameters:
        filename - - file to be sent.
        destUser - - user to send file to.

      • sendFileRequest

        public static void sendFileRequest(java.lang.String usernameRecipient,
                                   java.lang.String filename)
        Send a request to server to send a file to a destination user.
        Parameters:
        usernameRecipient - - destination user to recieve file.
        filename - - filename to send.

      • receiveFile

        public static void receiveFile(Message message)
        Receive a file packet and store it in a byte array which represents the file. If the last packet is received based on packetsequencenumber and the total number of packets recieved matches then save final file and notify user that transfer was successful (via server). else notify user that file transfer was not successful (via server).
        Parameters:
        message - - message object containing the file packet.

      • privateChatRequest

        public static void privateChatRequest(java.lang.String usernameRecipient)
        Send a private chat request to a server thread
        Parameters:
        usernameRecipient - - the client who is to be the other chat partner

      • privateChat

        public static void privateChat(java.lang.String msg)
        Send a private chat message to a server thread
        Parameters:
        msg - - the message that is to be sent to the server thread

      • blockUser

        public static void blockUser(java.lang.String user)
        Block a user Add the user to the client's internal blockedUsers list Send the name of the user to be blocked to a server thread
        Parameters:
        user - - the name of the user that is to be blocked

        public void dummyMessageTest()
